ComicInfo.Title: Operation: Deep Freeze - Part 1: Ultimatums
ComicInfo.Summary: The CIA wants the X-O Manowar armor, but Aric won't hand it over! How long can Aric refuse the government's demands without endangering those closest to him? The fight of Aric's life begins here, sending him on a quest to the most brutal ends of the Earth!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:07:29. [Issue ID 37441]
